full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN PA YONGS RDZOGS KYI SROG SHING DU LHAG PAR GCES PA LAS 'BRAS KYI RNAM BZHAG RNAM PAR 'BYED CING GSAL BAR BSHAD PA'I LAS 'BRAS GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @058A *, ,CES LAS 'BRAS KYI RNAM BZHAG GSAL BOR STON PA GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIG GNAS LA SBYANGS PA MI DMAN PA MER GEN CHOS RJE YE SHES DPAL LDAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA DANG, RANG GIS KYANG LAS 'BRAS LA YID CHES KYI NGES PA BSKYED PA'I PHYIR DANG, KHO BOS BRIS PA'I LAM RIM KHRID CHEN GYI LHAN THABS SU YANG 'GYUR MA SNYAM DU BTZUN PA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS KYI YI GE PA NI MKHYEN RABS YANGS PA THO YON 'JAM DBYANGS DON GRUB BO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
